5D98FB54-FD7E-46D7-84CD-761785B9BD5D.text: This action runs a Python script that can be configured with your own parameters. Tap the options (▼) button to edit the script or the parameters that are shown here. This comment is actually a text parameter itself – feel free to remove it.

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
# Sets
#import dis
import workflow

params = workflow.get_parameters()
A = list(params['A'])
B = list(params['B'])

### BORROWED CODE
#http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3852780/python-intersection-of-multiple-lists
def getIntersection(*S):
    sets = iter(map(set, S))
    result = sets.next()
    for s in sets:
        result = result.intersection(s)
    return ''.join(list(set(result)))

### END BORROWED CODE


def getUnion(*S):
	result = set().union(*S)
	return ''.join(list(set(result)))


workflow.set_output(getUnion(A,B))
